channel.title: 317 -Webclient help needed-
channel.description:
Well the idea started because my friends mom is an idiot because she thinks the batch file that runs the client is actualy hacking her comp she wont let my friend download it so i wanted to know...
is it possible to make a 317 webclient with html?
How would i make it?
dont just tell me "use the seach bar you idiot" because ive been searching for an hour so earthier help or just dont lean a comment
thank you

item.title: 317 -Webclient help needed-
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

u first have to “jar” ur client,

then upload the “jar” to ur website

then just add a simple HTML code to one of ur pages to load the “jar”

and the can all play

There are tutorials about it use google and search or use search bar of moparscape
look for things like
“jar webclient”
“make webclient”
ect…
There are a bunch working and non working tuts about it

Read full topic
